title: Is Jimin the leader of BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: No,Jimin isn’t leader of bts..leader is Kim Namjoon(RM)  That is smt.about him and you can see he’s leader~   Also Tae is visual and he is in dance line but not totally like some fans said he is,some he’s not but,Yeah~     Just to help you out wuth positions…and don’t get confused….main is when you are the best in that category and it’s followed by lead… Bye~

No jimin is not the leader of bts. The leader is Kim Namjoon or as he’s known as RM or Rap Monster  This guy Here’s another one of him and jungkook  RM is the leader and is a rapper. heres Jimin  Jimin is the oldest of the maknae line and a vocalist. Not the leader.
